name: tvify
description: Una web para seleccionar tus shows favoritos

scripts.build-js: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/js/index.js -o public/app.js && uglifyjs public/app.js -o public/app.min.js
scripts.copy-files: cp -r src/fonts public/ && cp src/index.html public/index.html
scripts.build: npm run public && npm run build-css && npm run build-js && npm run copy-files
